H0.text: Exchanging information electronically is the best description of construction technology.

H1.text: Changing raw materials into goods is the best description of construction technology.

H2.text: Building and finishing a structure best describes construction technology.

H3.text: Converting and transmitting energy is the best description of construction technology.

A4.text: Structural engineering involves the analysis and design of the built environment (buildings, bridges, equipment supports, towers and walls).

A5.text: Electrical engineers are responsible for the building's electric power distribution, telecommunication, fire alarm, signalization, lightning protection and control systems, as well as lighting systems.

A6.text: The traditional disciplines of engineering are civil, mechanical, electrical, and chemical.
